____comments: item can be null => item section should be gone
inlineAction can be null => inlineAction section should be gone
tag can be null => tag section should be gone
item.link is not the same as inlineAction.link
item.link is called when image clicked
inlineAction.link is called when inlineAction clicked
obviously when item is null, image is not clickable and the same concept is applied for inlineAction
the progress of download in inlineAction is hard to implement, so for the next two months, we guaranty that inlineAction.link==item.link

Comments.body: خیلی خوبه ولی ایکاش فارسی بود
علی حرف نداره. من دو ماه نصب کردم و واقعا نتیجه گرفتم امیدوارم نصب کنید و برای شما هم خوب باشه
